The two satellites were placed respectively in LEO ( low earth orbit ) and geostationary transfer orbit.
两颗卫星分别进入近地轨道和地球同步转移轨道.
So while installing to regulate organization adjustment orbit height through an orbit.
所以在安装时要通过轨道调节机构调整轨道高度.

天卫六与天卫七属于同步轨道半径之内.
The first spacecraft entered the orbit around Venus and remains in that orbit making observations.
